EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2016.First Price Cliff $300 - 4-7-16 send
EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne Platform early registration pricing ends soon, pre-conference training announced
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]> Early price ends April 15th!
The early price ends April 15th, so register now <[[https://springoneplatform.io/register]]> and save $300. Join top industry developers, operators, architects, product managers, data scientists, and executives as we gather for in-depth conversations on the current and future impact of transformative software at SpringOne Platform 2016.
Pre-conference training July 31â€”Aug 1st
Pivotal Education offers a series of accelerated, hands-on training workshops prior to the SpringOne Platform conference. Early ticket prices for training also expire April 15th, so register now for in-depth training on some of the latest Pivotal and Spring technologies and save $50.00!
Building Applications with Cloud Foundry <[[http://springoneplatform.io/training#developing-applications-with-cloud-foundry]]> Building the Connected Car <[[http://springoneplatform.io/training#building-the-connected-car]]> Spring Cloud Services <[[http://springoneplatform.io/training#spring-cloud-services]]> Spring Boot Primer <[[http://springoneplatform.io/training#spring-boot-primer]]>
See you there,
The Pivotal team
